title: Dees-Tigers practice match abandoned after lightning delay strikes twice
desc: The practice match between Melbourne and Richmond in Ballarat has been abandoned before three-quarter time

title: Weather tracker: US cities close schools and cancel flights amid heavy snowfall
desc: Winter Storm Hernando, which struck north-eastern regions this week, described as a ‘bomb cyclone’

title: Court Voids Malami’s Bail in Money Laundering Case
desc: A court has voided former AGF Abubakar Malami's bail in his N8.7bn money laundering trial, ordering his remand in Kuje correctional centre.

title: Bomet court jails drug trafficker for 50 years
desc: Bernard Miyeiende Kerongo is also fined Sh50 million after being caught with 278kg of cannabis

title: COSI’s ‘Science Behind Pixar’ explores STEM in film
desc: COSI’s “Science Behind Pixar” exhibit runs through Memorial Day.

title: Why tensions are flaring again between Afghanistan and Pakistan
desc: Pakistan carried out air strikes on Afghanistan's major cities, escalating months of border clashes.

title: Brigitte Bardot tribute at the César awards greeted with boos
desc: A shout of ‘racist’ could also be heard during the segment at France’s version of the Oscars

title: Sonny Styles, David Bailey impress in Combine workouts
desc: Sonny Styles's play at Ohio State made him one of the top prospects in this year's draft class and his chances of being one of the first names called in April were given another boost with Thursday's performance at the Scouting Combine.

title: Amnesty: How Tiger Base police officers torture, execute suspects in Imo
desc: Amnesty International (AI) has released a report highlighting the alleged atrocities committed by officers of the anti-kidnapping unit of the Imo police command, popularly known as Tiger Base.

title: Aladwa: No elections at upcoming NDC
desc: The MP said that the upcoming NDC will primarily serve as a consultative and policy-guiding forum.
